name: Tower of Thruth
description:
Submission for Bratislava Game Jam 2020 / GDS Game Jam 2020

The game was created in 48h. Theme of the gamejam was "Disinformation and Conspiracy Theories".

Description:

The less you know the better. Learning rules of the game is part of the experience.

Controls:

Everything you need to know is explained in game ;)

Author:

Boris Kudlač
